text: (ivarkaḷukku) muṉṉiruntavarkaḷum (avarkaḷ virumpiyavāṟu nām koṭutta) attāṭcikaḷai poyyākki viṭṭaṉar eṉṟa kāraṇattait tavira, (ippōtuḷḷavarkaḷ kōrum) attāṭcikaḷai aṉuppivaikka vēṟoṉṟum namakku taṭaiyāka illai. (Itaṟku muṉṉar) ‘samūtu' eṉṉum makkaḷukku (avarkaḷ virumpiyavāṟē) oru peṇ oṭṭakattai attāṭciyākak koṭuttiruntōm. Avarkaḷō varampu mīṟi ataṟkut tīṅkiḻaittu viṭṭaṉar. (Avarkaḷ virumpukiṉṟa) attāṭcikaḷai (avarkaḷaip) payamuṟuttuvataṟkākavē tavira nām aṉuppuvatillai
